주문 목록 II

드루이드 주문

0 레벨 드루이드 주문 (소마법)

  • 물 생성: Creates 2 gallons/level of pure water.
  • 사소한 상처 치유: Cures 1 point of damage.
  • 마법 감지: Detects spells and magic items within 60 ft.
  • 독 감지: Detects poison in one creature or object.
  • 섬광: Dazzles one creature (–1 penalty on attack rolls).
  • 길라잡이: +1 on one attack roll, saving throw, or skill check.
  • 방향 알아내기: You discern north.
  • 빛: Object shines like a torch.
  • 수선: Makes minor repairs on an object.
  • 음식과 음료 정화: Purifies 1 cu. ft./level of food or water.
  • 마법 읽기: Read scrolls and spellbooks.
  • 저항: Subject gains +1 bonus on saving throws.
  • 미덕: Subject gains 1 temporary hp.

1 레벨 드루이드 주문

  • 평온한 동물: Calms (2d4 + level) HD of animals.
  • 동물 매혹: Makes one animal your friend.
  • 가벼운 상처 치유: Cures 1d8 damage +1/level (max +5).
  • 동식물 감지: Detects kinds of animals or plants.
  • 올무와 구덩이 감지: Reveals natural or primitive traps.
  • 정령 견디기: Exist comfortably in hot or cold environments.
  • 휘감기: Plants entangle everyone in 40-ft.-radius.
  • 페어리의 불꽃: Outlines subjects with light, canceling blur, concealment, and the like.
  • 굿베리열매: 2d4 berries each cure 1 hp (max 8 hp/24 hours).
  • 동물로부터 숨기: Animals can’t perceive one subject/level.
  • 도약: Subject gets bonus on Jump checks.
  • 긴걸음주자: Your speed increases by 10 ft.
  • 마법 송곳니: One natural weapon of subject creature gets +1 on attack and damage rolls.
  • 마법의 돌: Three stones gain +1 on attack rolls, deal 1d6+1 damage.
  • 차폐의 안개: Fog surrounds you.
  • 흔적 없는 이동: One subject/level leaves no tracks.
  • 화염 생성: 1d6 damage +1/level, touch or thrown.
  • 실레일리: Cudgel or quarterstaff becomes +1 weapon (1d10 damage) for 1 min./level.
  • 동물과 대화: You can communicate with animals.
  • 자연의 동료 I 소환: Calls creature to fight.

2 레벨 드루이드 주문

  • 동물 사자: Sends a Tiny animal to a specific place.
  • 동물 최면: Fascinates 2d6 HD of animals.
  • 나무껍질피부: Grants +2 (or higher) enhancement to natural armor.
  • 곰의 지구력: Subject gains +4 to Con for 1 min./level.
  • 황소의 근력: Subject gains +4 to Str for 1 min./level.
  • 고양이의 우아함: Subject gains +4 to Dex for 1 min./level.
  • 한기 어린 금속: Cold metal damages those who touch it.
  • 중독 지연: Stops poison from harming subject for 1 hour/level.
  • 화염 함정 M: Opened object deals 1d4 +1/level damage.
  • 화염 칼날: Touch attack deals 1d8 +1/two levels damage.
  • 화염의 구: Creates rolling ball of fire, 2d6 damage, lasts 1 round/level.
  • 안개 구름: Fog obscures vision.
  • 돌풍: Blows away or knocks down smaller creatures.
  • 금속 가열: Make metal so hot it damages those who touch it.
  • 동물 포박: Paralyzes one animal for 1 round/level.
  • 부엉이의 지혜: Subject gains +4 to Wis for 1 min./level.
  • 동물 축소: Shrinks one willing animal.
  • 에너지 저항: Ignores 10 (or more) points of damage/attack from specified energy type.
  • 복원, 하급: Dispels magical ability penalty or repairs 1d4 ability damage.
  • 물렁한 대지와 암석: Turns stone to clay or dirt to sand or mud.
  • 거미 기어오르기: Grants ability to walk on walls and ceilings.
  • 자연의 동료 II 소환: Calls creature to fight.
  • 무리 소환: Summons swarm of bats, rats, or spiders.
  • 나무 형태: You look exactly like a tree for 1 hour/level.
  • 나무 왜곡: Bends wood (shaft, handle, door, plank).
  • 목재 조형: Rearranges wooden objects to suit you.

3 레벨 드루이드 주문

  • 번개 소환: Calls down lightning bolts (3d6 per bolt) from sky.
  • 역병: Infects subject with chosen disease.
  • 일반적인 상처 치유: Cures 2d8 damage +1/level (max +10).
  • 햇살: 60-ft. radius of bright light.
  • 식물 약화: Reduces size or blights growth of normal plants.
  • 동물 지배: Subject animal obeys silent mental commands.
  • 마법 송곳니, 상급: One natural weapon of subject creature gets +1/four levels on attack and damage rolls (max +5).
  • 돌에 스며들기: You and your gear merge with stone.
  • 독성 무효화: Immunizes subject against poison, detoxifies venom in or on subject.
  • 식물 성장: Grows vegetation, improves crops.
  • 독: Touch deals 1d10 Con damage, repeats in 1 min.
  • 에너지 방어 마법: Absorb 12 points/level of damage from one kind of energy.
  • 진화: Extinguishes nonmagical fires or one magic item.
  • 질병 제거: Cures all diseases affecting subject.
  • 진눈깨비 폭풍: Hampers vision and movement.
  • 올무: Creates a magic booby trap.
  • 식물과 대화: You can talk to normal plants and plant creatures.
  • 가시 성장: Creatures in area take 1d4 damage, may be slowed.
  • 암석 조형: Sculpts stone into any shape.
  • 자연의 동료 III 소환: Calls creature to fight.
  • 수중 호흡: Subjects can breathe underwater.
  • 바람 장벽: Deflects arrows, smaller creatures, and gases.

4 레벨 드루이드 주문

  • 공중 보행: Subject treads on air as if solid (climb at 45-degree angle).
  • 대식물 보호막: Keeps animated plants at bay.
  • 마름병: Withers one plant or deals 1d6/level damage to plant creature.
  • 식물 명령: Sway the actions of one or more plant creatures.
  • 물 조종: Raises or lowers bodies of water.
  • 심각한 상처 치유: Cures 3d8 damage +1/level (max +15).
  • 마법 무효화: Cancels spells and magical effects.
  • 화염 타격: Smite foes with divine fire (1d6/level damage).
  • 이동의 자유: Subject moves normally despite impediments.
  • 거대 해충: Turns centipedes, scorpions, or spiders into giant vermin.
  • 얼음 폭풍: Hail deals 5d6 damage in cylinder 40 ft. across.
  • 환생: Brings dead subject back in a random body.
  • 무리 퇴치: Insects, spiders, and other vermin stay 10 ft. away.
  • 부식의 손아귀: Your touch corrodes iron and alloys.
  • 염탐 F: Spies on subject from a distance.
  • 가시 암석: Creatures in area take 1d8 damage, may be slowed.
  • 자연의 동료 IV 소환: Calls creature to fight.

5 레벨 드루이드 주문

  • 동물 성장: One animal/two levels doubles in size.
  • 속죄: Removes burden of misdeeds from subject.
  • 각성 X: Animal or tree gains human intellect.
  • 해로운 변이: Transforms subject into harmless animal.
  • 번개폭풍 소환: As call lightning, but 5d6 damage per bolt.
  • 자연과 소통: Learn about terrain for 1 mile/level.
  • 바람 조종: Change wind direction and speed.
  • 치명적인 상처 치유: Cures 4d8 damage +1/level (max +20).
  • 죽음의 수호물: Grants immunity to all death spells and negative energy effects.
  • 신성화 M: Designates location as holy.
  • 곤충 역병: Locust swarms attack creatures.
  • 돌피부 M: Ignore 10 points of damage per attack.
  • 자연의 동료 V 소환: Calls creature to fight.
  • 진흙을 바위로 변성: Transforms two 10-ft. cubes per level.
  • 바위를 진흙으로 변성: Transforms two 10-ft. cubes per level.
  • 나무 활보: Step from one tree to another far away.
  • 반신성화 M: Designates location as unholy.
  • 불의 장벽: Deals 2d4 fire damage out to 10 ft. and 1d4 out to 20 ft. Passing through wall deals 2d6 damage +1/level.
  • 가시 장벽: Thorns damage anyone who tries to pass.

  • 곰의 지구력, 광역: As bear’s endurance, affects one subject/ level.
  • 황소의 근력, 광역: As bull’s strength, affects one subject/level.
  • 고양이의 우아함, 광역: As cat’s grace, affects one subject/level.
  • 가벼운 상처 치유, 광역: Cures 1d8 damage +1/level for many creatures.

  • 길 찾기: Shows most direct way to a location.
  • 불꽃 씨앗: Acorns and berries become grenades and bombs.
  • 강철나무: Magic wood is strong as steel.
  • 생참나무: Oak becomes treant guardian.
  • 지형 조정: Digs trenches and builds hills.
  • 부엉이의 지혜, 광역: As owl’s wisdom, affects one subject/level.
  • 나무 퇴치: Pushes away wooden objects.
  • 주문지팡이: Stores one spell in wooden quarterstaff.
  • 돌과 대화: Talk to natural or worked stone.
  • 자연의 동료 VI 소환: Calls creature to fight.
  • 식물 경유 공간이동: Move instantly from one plant to another of the same kind.
  • 암석 장벽: Creates a stone wall that can be shaped.

7 레벨 드루이드 주문

  • 살아 움직이는 식물: One or more plants animate and fight for you.
  • 변화지팡이: Your staff becomes a treant on command.
  • 날씨 조종: Changes weather in local area.
  • 스멀거리는 파멸: Swarms of centipedes attack at your command.
  • 일반적인 상처 치유, 광역: Cures 2d8 damage +1/level for many creatures.
  • 화염 폭품: Deals 1d6/level fire damage.
  • 치료: Cures 10 points/level of damage, all diseases and mental conditions.
  • 염탐, 상급: As scrying, but faster and longer.
  • 자연의 동료 VII 소환: Calls creature to fight.
  • 태양광선: Beam blinds and deals 4d6 damage.
  • 금속을 나무로 변성: Metal within 40 ft. becomes wood.
  • 진실의 시야 M: Lets you see all things as they really are.
  • 바람 보행: You and your allies turn vaporous and travel fast.

8 레벨 드루이드 주문

  • 동물 형태: One ally/level polymorphs into chosen animal.

  • 지진: Intense tremor shakes 80-ft.-radius.
  • 죽음의 손가락: Kills one subject.
  • 금속과 암석 퇴치: Pushes away metal and stone.
  • 중력 역전: Objects and creatures fall upward.
  • 자연의 동료 VIII 소환: Calls creature to fight.
  • 태양폭발: Blinds all within 10 ft., deals 6d6 damage.
  • 훨윈드: Cyclone deals damage and can pick up creatures.
  • 귀환의 명령: Teleports you back to designated place.

9 레벨 드루이드 주문

  • 반감 부여: Object or location affected by spell repels certain creatures.
  • 치명적인 상처 치유, 광역: Cures 4d8 damage +1/level for many creatures.
  • 정령 떼: Summons multiple elementals.
  • 예언: “Sixth sense” warns of impending danger.
  • 재생: Subject’s severed limbs grow back, cures 4d8 damage +1/level (max +35).
  • 휘청거리는 자: Summons 1d4+2 shambling mounds to fight for you.
  • 형태변경 F: Transforms you into any creature, and change forms once per round.
  • 폭풍의 복수: Storm rains acid, lightning, and hail.

  • 공감 M: Object or location attracts certain creatures.

  • 저주 제거: Frees object or person from curse.
